ModMetaData.name: Quantum Cooling
ModMetaData.author: Alaestor
ModMetaData.description:
--Mod Version: 2.0.2 Go tell Thermodynamics to screw off!
Using quantum mechanics; you can discover how to reduce entropy without displacing it.
Quantum Cooling technology allows for exhaustless cooling.
It can be used to reach extremely low temperatures; but is relatively expensive and consumes a lot of power.
